resources.string: There is no data to share.
There is no data to delete.
Do you want to delete all items?
If you press back button one more, then program will be done.

- To register an item, click add button or click anywhere on the screen.
- To modify an added item, click on the item again.
- To delete an item, swipe the added item.
- To change the order of items, press and hold the drag icon on the right to rearrange.
- Always check your to-do list by adding a widget.
